title: HashMicro Showcases the Power of AI-Driven ERP at Singapore's Leading Tech Forum
description: SINGAPORE, Dec. 24, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- HashMicro attended the SME AI Growth Day 2025 on December 4th in Singapore. Organized by Alibaba Cloud, the event brought together more than 250 business leaders, technology players, and industry decision-makers to explore how artificial intelligence (AI) can be applied effectively to drive business growth.

title: Can AI surpass humans? Google DeepMind CEO claims AI can match human learning, Elon Musk backs the view
description: Google DeepMind CEO has suggested that artificial intelligence is capable of learning anything humans can, a view that has drawn support from Elon Musk, adding fresh momentum to the debate over how far AI can ultimately rival human intelligence.
content:
Artificial intelligence is once again in the spotlight. A new debate has started over whether AI can one day learn and think like humans. Some top technology leaders believe this could happen in the future, while others are not so sure.

title: AGI debate heats up as Demis Hassabis calls Yann LeCun’s view ‘plain incorrect’
description: The exchange between LeCun and Hassabis underscores broader differences in how the pair view the path to achieving artificial general intelligence (AGI).
content:
“We think of ourselves as being general, but it’s simply an illusion because all of the problems that we can apprehend are the ones that we can think of,” the Turing Award winner said in a recent podcast appearance.

title: Economist Acemoglu to Newsmax: AI Faces Trillion-Dollar Gamble
description: Nobel Prize-winning economist Daron Acemoglu told Newsmax on Tuesday that artificial intelligence might have a path to profitability but warned it is an increasingly unlikely one given the staggering capital required to build and maintain the infrastructure.

title: Stocks up as markets wind down to bumper year; gold and silver smash records
description: SYDNEY: Asian shares advanced on Wednesday, capping a year of brisk artificial intelligence-driven gains, while commodities such as gold and silver extended their bullish run to new all-time highs as 2025 draws to a close.

title: Bull Run in Asian Stocks and Precious Metals as 2025 Closes
description: Asian shares and precious metals achieved significant gains by the end of 2025, driven largely by advancements in artificial intelligence. The S&P 500 reached a record high, and commodities like gold and silver hit new peak prices. Stocks in South Korea, Japan, and the broader Asia-Pacific region performed exceptionally well.
content:
As the year 2025 draws to a close, Asian shares and commodities like gold and silver have reported remarkable growth, largely driven by artificial intelligence advancements. This marked a positive year-end shift in market sentiment across the globe.

title: Instacart ends AI pricing test that charged shoppers different prices for the same items
description: Instacart will stop using artificial intelligence to experiment with product pricing after a report showed that customers on the platform were paying different prices for the same items.
content:
Instacart will stop using artificial intelligence to experiment with product pricing after a report showed that customers on the platform were paying different prices for the same items.
